nodes.text: This green-bladed lightsaber was the personal weapon of the Jedi Roron Corobb. After Confederate General Grievous killed Corobb during the Battle of Coruscant, the lightsaber fell into the cyborg's possession.

Roron Corobb had previously appeared in Star Wars Legends in the 2003 TV series Star Wars: Clone Wars, where he was depicted wielding a blue-bladed lightsaber. In the book Star Wars Lightsabers: A Guide to Weapons of the Force, a 2018 reference book that is part of the canon continuity, Corobb is now depicted with a green blade.
